title: Still Can't Log In
body: It's now been three days since I've been able to play. I found that after I updated to the newest patch, I could not log in to the client anymore. I can't log in to the legacy or beta client. For the legacy client, it says that it can't connect to the pvp.net and for the beta client it says that an error occurred and then it gets stuck on authenticating. I read the support article on login issues and tried flushing my DNS and changing it, restarting my computer, the hextech repair tool, etc....

replies.body: Updating the client may be a coincidence, as they both use the same login servers.  A setting with your network could have changed that's no longer getting through and authenticating your login.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  guide to troubleshoot, and restore comms.  Let me know if you have any questions.
